Name: Mugen Abisu
About the game: Try to dodge the traps on our endless platform game. Slash the enemies to get more points. The dungeon is getting darker and harder in time so stay sharp! This is an action platform game with various traps and enemies. You should use your sword to kill the enemies. Two potions available, one for HP refill, other one for the magic.
